description: ff. 24. 199 x 136; 146 x 83 mm. 19 lin. 1083 H. Muḥibbī, Khulāṣat al-athar (1284 H.), I, 135-139. Abridgment - with additions - of Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Zayn al-Dīn ʻUmar al-Saʻdī al-Ḥalabīʼs al-Risālah al-Muḥammadīyah fī al-radd ʻan al-sādah al-Saʻdīyah (Brockelmann, GAL, SN II, 1008, 115a), divided into five bābs and khātimah. Fol. 1 is missing. Incip. (as extant): ... ورسالة عنىفة منىفة فى بىان طرىقة السادة السعدىة ... وسمىتها حىن رسمتها بالنفحة الربانىة
author: Ghazzī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1632
title: al-Nafḥah al-rabbānīyah fī al-ṭarīqah al-Saʻdīyah
creator: Ghazzī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1632
subject: Sufism—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
